trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> para acompanhar o status de iluminação do office.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property associates "unknown" to indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> propriedade associa "turnedOff" `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> propriedade associa "turnedOn" `true`e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> propriedade associa "desconhecido" para indeterminado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a representação de cadeia de caracteres da célula.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa a célula atual.

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the cell includes the row index and column index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A representação de cadeia de caracteres da célula inclui o índice de linha e o índice de coluna da célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor subjacente correspondente a um valor de célula de <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> corresponding to a cell value of <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> correspondente a um valor de célula de <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> propriedades determinam os valores associados desses estados conforme elas ocorrem na fonte de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> property of the owning column also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> também define uma propriedade da coluna de propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> a propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibir.

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> to track the status of office lighting.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> para acompanhar o status de iluminação do office.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property associates "unknown" to indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> propriedade associa "turnedOff" `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> propriedade associa "turnedOn" `true`e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> propriedade associa "desconhecido" para indeterminado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data type of the values in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de dados dos valores na célula.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the underlying value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do valor subjacente da célula.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ValueType%2A> property of the cell has not been set, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A> property for the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> is used, if the column exists.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ValueType%2A> propriedade da célula não foi definida, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A> propriedade para a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> for usado, se a coluna existe.

trans-unit.source: If no owning column exists, then this property is set to the default type appropriate for its mode: <xref:System.Boolean> for binary mode and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> for ternary mode.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma coluna de propriedade existe, essa propriedade é definida como o tipo de padrão apropriado para o modo: <xref:System.Boolean> de modo binário e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> para o modo Ternário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> is the actual data object contained in the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> é o objeto de dados reais contido na célula, enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> propriedade é a representação formatada deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ValueType%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType%2A> propriedades correspondem aos tipos de dados desses valores, respectivamente.
